summary: The announcement provides additional information regarding the proposed private placement, specifically clarifying the utilization of proceeds based on minimum and maximum scenarios. It details the allocation of funds for the acquisition of PMSB, working capital, and estimated expenses.

utilisation_of_proceeds.use: Acquisition of 30% equity interest in Propel Maxflo Sdn Bhd (PMSB)
utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Funding the acquisition of 545,044 ordinary shares in PMSB.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Within 12 months from the receipt of funds

utilisation_of_proceeds.amount: RM2.982 million (Minimum Scenario), RM4.408 million (Maximum Scenario)
utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Payment of financing charges, staff related cost and general administrative expenses, mainly for its renewable energy activities.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Within 12 months from the receipt of funds

utilisation_of_proceeds.use: Estimated expenses for the Proposed Private Placement
utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Professional fees, regulatory fees, and contingencies.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Upon completion of the Proposed Private Placement
